channel.title: SPB on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in SPB on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Engeyum Eppothum (Ninaithale Inikkum) Lyrics and Translation
item.description: Here is a song with both Rajani and Kamal Hassan with Jayaprada. It is from a movie called Ninaithale Inikkum. Also from the 80´s. Thanks to my dad for corrections with the translation.

item.title: Vaasam Ella Malar Ithu
item.description: The nusic for this song was composed by T Rajendar and anthother person. It was their first movie, called Oru Thalai Raagam, meaning one sided raagam, implying unrequitted love.

item.title: Satham Illatha Thanimai Kaetten
item.description: This song is from a movie called Amarkalam, starring Ajit and Shalini. The song is sung by SPB and supposed to have been breathless in the movie.

item.title: Mannil Intha Kadal (Breathless) – Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This song is from the movie Keladi Kanmani. A widower is bringing up a child and when he meets one of her teachers, they begin to fall in love.

item.title: Tamil Songs Translated
item.description: Tamil Songs Translated is an archive where all Tamil songs I have translated can be found. Why don’t you take a look now? /category/poetry/lyrics-translations/ [
